org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.io
Class DateWritable

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.io.DateWritable

public class DateWritable
extends Object

DateWritable Writable equivalent of java.sql.Date. Dates are of the format YYYY-MM-DD
